meanings.definition: Valpolicellas: a type of red wine produced in the Valpolicella region of Italy.
meanings.sent1: I enjoyed a glass of valpolicellas with my dinner last night.
meanings.sent2: The restaurant had a great selection of valpolicellas on their wine list.
meanings.sent3: At the party, everyone was impressed by the rich flavor of the valpolicellas.
meanings.sent4: The aroma of the valpolicellas filled the room, creating a warm and inviting atmosphere.
meanings.sent5: The valpolicellas from Italy are known for their smooth taste and deep color.
